title: How to Have a Green Christmas: Discover 50 Ways to Have an Eco-Friendly Holiday
description: People all around the world are celebrating Christmas in a more environmentally friendly way. Celebrating a Green Christmas will not only help save the environment, it will also save you money. How to Have a Green Christmas gives you 50 ways to celebrate a more eco-friendly (and wallet friendly!) Christmas this year.If you are looking for simple steps to green your Christmas, this short ebook delivers 50 easy to implement, eco-friendly holiday practices in a convenient, easy to follow, format including short stories from the authorâ€™s life. You will learn how to:-Protect the environment-Save money-Reduce waste-Lower your energy bill in a fun way-Buy fewer gifts while still celebrating the giving seasonJoin millions of people across the world that will make this Christmas a Green Christmas.
author: Henry  Owen
